name: WIRECROSS: Shareware Episode
description:
Developed in 30 days for E1M1 Magazine Jam 2, the final release was impeded by technical issues most likely related to Unity's URP.

The first Shareware episode, NO TIME LIKE THE PRESENT, will release in 2022.

==

VIDEO IS KILLING THE RADIO STAR

Explore a world where staunch technological traditionalists of punch cards and pneumatic tubes are forced to adopt the ways of a rival technocracy as two primary forces battle for power in the Obsolete Sectors.  From mail tubes to teleporters, the world of Wirecross is a balancing act of two opposing worlds in their own no-compromises visions of the future.

As Janet Tuttle, an unassuming resident of SPARK/HYDRALL Collaboration Zone, you will be thrown right into the middle of the ongoing war between two all-powerful worlds.

PASS THE AUX CABLE

Featuring the audio talents of Soundwich and Nathan Sharples, the tube-stuffed dark and dreary world of Combustion has been realized to its fullest potential.  Take a full-immersion journey through decaying and deteriroating infrastructure, and when push comes to shove, go to war with everything digital while the song fights the same battle alongside you.

ORWELL AS A TEXTBOOK

Drawing heavy inspiration from the greatest visionaries in dystopian and noir films, immense care has been placed into creating a multilayered world that is merciless to those that fall out of line.  The longer you explore, the more questions you'll have, and the more the answers might just be a danger in and of themselves.

JUST LIKE DAD USED TO MAKE

Featuring eight unique weapons, each with their own alt-fires and quirks, you'll be up against powerful foes that run fast and hit hard... but you run faster, and you hit harder.

DO THE STUFF

Boop the boxes.  Break the coffee mug.  Talk to every single citizen.  See that mail tube?  You can check it.

Play through a world that is interactible down to all the little things, and uncover more about each region every time you visit it.  Each level has some unique traits you might not catch the first time!
